plot: Ichigo Amano is an average, sweets-loving, 14 year old girl who dreams of becoming a pâtissiere like her grandma. One day, she is scouted by a genius pâtissier to enroll in St. Marie Academy - an elite patisserie school. Here she meets new friends and the Sweets Spirits, which partner with humans to help make their dreams come true.
opening_theme: "Yume ni Yell! Patissiere (夢にエール!パティシエール♪)" by Mayumi Gojo
ending_theme: "Ichigo no Miracle (いちごのミラクルール)" by Yukina Sugihara
